ITTIA DB SQL C++ API Reference  8.4.1
Class List
Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
[detail level 1234]
 ▼Nstorage
 ▼Ndata
 CErrorStorage error information. Call Environment::error() to get the last error in the current thread
 ►CEnvironmentInitialize the storage API and OS services layer enviroment
 CMemoryConfigConfiguration for built-in memory allocator
 CFieldA Database field containing a typed value. A Field object represents a specific field in a database row. It can be used to access the value of the field, modify the value, and convert the value to other types
 CFieldDefinitionEncapsulate field schema definition
 CResourceHandleDatabase resource handle encapsulation. Type T should be declared with DB_DECLARE_HANDLE()
 CRowSetA Row Result Set class. Holds list of rows fetched for given row defintion
 CTypedRowTraitsSpecialize TypedRowTraits with the following public members:
 ►CRowCollection of Field values
 CFieldIteratorIterator class for ResultField and const ResultField types
 CRowDefinition
 CSingleFieldIt holds single field value
 CSingleRowIt holds single row of a table

 ▼Nittiadb
 CCatalogAccess and modify table, index, foreign key, and sequence definitions stored in an ITTIA DB SQL database
 ►CConnectionA database Connection class
 CAuthInfo
 CFileStorageConfigDatabase file storage configuration
 CMemoryStorageConfigDatabase memory storage configuration
 CNestedTransaction
 CQueryPerform an SQL query in the database
 ►CReplicationCatalogAccess and modify replication settings stored in an ITTIA DB SQL database
 CPeerDefinitionReplication peer definition
 CTableInfoReplication table information
 CReplicationPeerAccess a replication peer in the database
 CSequenceAccess a sequence generator in the database
 ►CServer
 CConfig
 CTableAccess a table in the database. The Table class is used to access all data stored in a table. A Table object can be used to read rows one at a time, search for indexed data, and insert new rows
 CITableEventHandlerInterface for table event handler
 CTableWatcherWatch the table for change notification events
 CTransactionAtomically commits or rolls back changes made to a database through a specific connection and releases any locks held by that connection. A transaction must be committed to preserve changes or share changes with other concurrent connections
 CSecurityAgentCreate a security agent for a database
 ▼Ntypes
 CBindTraitsBind traits are used to bind a C or C++ data type to a storage::data::Row object or get/set a storage::data::Field object. This template class is specialized for each data type
 CVarBindTraitsBind traits for simple fixed-size variable types
 CConstStrBindTraitsBind traits for constant NUL-terminated character arrays of fixed size
 CStrBindTraitsBind traits for NUL-terminated character arrays of fixed size
 CPtrBindTraitsBind traits for pointers of unknown size
 CCharPtrBindTraitsBind traits for NUL-terminated character strings
 CInheritedBindTraitsBind traits inherited from another type
 CCastBindTraitsBind traits for a type that may be cast to a bindable type

 CCharacterVaryingThe CharacterVarying class is a buffer for database strings. The buffer size can only be set when the object is created so that bindings to the object will remain stable
 CBindTraits< CharacterVarying< N, charT > >Traits to bind fixed sized nullable database strings

 CNullableThe Nullable class stores an optional value of any bindable type. Nullable objects can be used with ResultField::get, ResultField::set, and ResultRow::bind
